name: Be Kind (HurlCatGames)
description:
Built in one week for the BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2020.2

This game has the player taking the role of a video store employee who needs to keep the store stocked and customers happy in an unkind society...

Rummage through the movie bin  for the right genre movie, rewind tapes before stocking them, and take customers payments before you inevitably go out of business due to streaming services
